API_KEY.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

STRING_SESSION.description: Get this value by running python3 session.py locally(or heroku console)

UPSTREAM_REPO_URL.description: Copy paste the repository url here (fork/official)

IBM_WATSON_CRED_URL.description: This is required for the speech to text module. Get your USERNAME from https://console.bluemix.net/docs/services/speech-to-text/getting-started.html

IBM_WATSON_CRED_PASSWORD.description: This is required for the speech to text module. Get your PASSWORD from https://console.bluemix.net/docs/services/speech-to-text/getting-started.html

LYDIA_API_KEY.description: This module needs CoffeeHouse API to work. So join https://telegram.dog/IntellivoidDev and send #activateapi and follow instructions

OCR_API_KEY.description: Get an API Key from https://cloudmersive.com/ocr-api

GBAN_LOGS.description: The group id for logging all gbans

REM_BG_API_KEY.description: Get your own API key from https://www.remove.bg/

SUDO_USERS.description: List of user id's who will have SUDO rights in your bot(they can gban/ungban users)

YOUTUBE_API_KEY.description: Place your YouTube API Key here, check out https://developers.google.com/youtube/v3/getting-started)

OWNER_ID.description: An integer of consisting of your ID

BOT_ID.description: Userid of the bot itself, use any other bot to get it

TIME_API_KEY.description: Required for timezone information, get your key from https://timezonedb.com/api

CASH_API_KEY.description: Required for currency converter, get your key from https://www.alphavantage.co/support/#api-key

WOLFRAM_ID.description: Required for Assistant module, get your own key from wolframalpha.com

ANTI_GBAN.description: List of chat ids that shouldn't enforce gban

JULIASONG.description: Channel link with @ where all songs should be dumped

JULIAVSONG.description: Channel link with @ where all video songs should be dumped

GOOGLE_SRCH_KEY.description: Required for google search, get it from from https://developers.google.com/custom-search/v1/overview

GOOGLE_SRCH_VALUE.description: Required for google search, get it from get your api key from https://developers.google.com/custom-search/v1/overview
